languages.text: "Для следующих Завету темнота есть союзник. Покров, что скрывает ткача от врагов Его. Но здесь... здесь она и есть враг".

traits.locale_text: "Для следующих Завету темнота есть союзник. Покров, что скрывает ткача от врагов Его. Но здесь... здесь она и есть враг".

languages.text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."
languages.original_text: "Для следующих Завету темнота есть союзник. Покров, что скрывает ткача от врагов Его. Но здесь... здесь она и есть враг".

traits.locale_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets. A cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."
"Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets. A cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

"Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."
"Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: «La oscuridad es aliada de quienes seguimos la Doctrina: es una capa que oculta a los tejedores de Sus enemigos. Pero aquí... Aquí, la oscuridad es el enemigo».
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: 「闇は教義に従う者の味方であり、敵から織り手を隠してくれる外套である。けれどここでは…闇こそが敵なのです」
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: “对遵守教义的人而言，黑暗是他们的盟友，将织网者笼罩在夜幕之下，避开不死之神敌人的视线。但在这里……黑暗是敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: "Dunkelheit ist die Verbündete aller Anhänger der Grundsätze, ein Umhang, der die Spinner vor Seinen Feinden verbirgt. Aber hier ... hier ist die Dunkelheit der Feind."
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: « Pour qui suit les Préceptes, les ténèbres peuvent être un puissant allié, un manteau dissimulant les tisseurs à Ses ennemis. Mais ici… ici, les ténèbres sont l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."
"Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."

languages.text: "Karanlık, İlkelerin izinden gidenlerin müttefikidir. Dokurları O'nun düşmanlarından gizleyen bir pelerindir. Ancak burada... Buradaki karanlık, düşmanın ta kendisi."
languages.original_text: "Darkness is an ally of those who follow the Tenets, a cloak that conceals the spinners from His enemies. But here... here, the darkness is the enemy."
